00100     public function createMethodsDefinitionCode()
00101     {
00102         if( $this->isInterface() )
00103         {
00104             return parent::createMethodsDefinitionCode();
00105         }
00106         
00107         $strCode = '';
00108         $boolHasConstructor = false;
00109         $boolHasDestructor = false;
00110 
00111         foreach( $this->getMethods() as $objMethodReflection )
00112         {
00113             if( $objMethodReflection->getName() == '__construct' )
00114             {
00115                 $boolHasConstructor = true;
00116             }
00117             if( $objMethodReflection->getName() == '__destruct' )
00118             {
00119                 $boolHasDestructor = true;
00120             }
00121         }
00122 
00123         $strCode = parent::createMethodsDefinitionCode();
00124         if( $boolHasConstructor == false )
00125         {
00126             $strCode .= ' public function __construct()                                                                 ' . "\n";
00127             $strCode .= '    {                                                                                          ' . "\n";
00128             $strCode .= '       $arrArguments = func_get_args();                                                        ' . "\n";
00129             $strCode .= '       $mixReturn = null;                                                                      ' . "\n";
00130             $strCode .= '       CodeInstrumentationReceiver::getInstance()->onEnterMethod( spl_object_hash($this) , __CLASS__ , __METHOD__ , $arrArguments );' . "\n";
00131             $strCode .= '       CodeInstrumentationReceiver::getInstance()->onLeaveMethod( spl_object_hash($this) , __CLASS__ , __METHOD__ , $mixReturn    );' . "\n";
00132             $strCode .= '       }                                                                                           ' . "\n";
00133         }
00134         if( $boolHasDestructor == false )
00135         {
00136             $strCode .= ' public function __destruct()                                                                 ' . "\n";
00137             $strCode .= '    {                                                                                          ' . "\n";
00138             $strCode .= '       $arrArguments = func_get_args();                                                        ' . "\n";
00139             $strCode .= '       $mixReturn = null;                                                                      ' . "\n";
00140             $strCode .= '       CodeInstrumentationReceiver::getInstance()->onEnterMethod( spl_object_hash($this) , __CLASS__ , __METHOD__ , $arrArguments );' . "\n";
00141             $strCode .= '       CodeInstrumentationReceiver::getInstance()->onLeaveMethod( spl_object_hash($this) , __CLASS__ , __METHOD__ , $mixReturn    );' . "\n";
00142             $strCode .= '       }                                                                                           ' . "\n";
00143         }
00144         return $strCode;
00145     }
